::Grounded::
Grounded dropeed the arm of BH and transformed to his mole form. He 
dove into the ground digging through it with blazing speed and 
popping up right between Vulois and Trinity transforming once again 
to look up at Vulois. His whips at his side flew to his hand and the 
green energy flowed over them. 
"Trinity go back. Bot what is your name and what do you want?"

open,
